name: Delta-17777
description:
--YOU MUST USE FULLSCREEN--

This is my game for the very prestigious "Why" GameJam held by Hog. The theme of the Jam was "Goodbye Sun" hence, the reason you try to "deconstruct" (yeet to oblivion) the Sun. There also 7 achievements hidden in the game (comment if you found them all). 

This is my first ever GameJam and my first ever finished game so don't expect too much. I'm happy to receive feedback and other ideas.

Short Story:

The year is 3487 and you and your squad of 4, have been sent out by the Mighty to destroy potentially dangerous solar systems. You have been given the squad name "Delta-17777", and your only mission is to terminate systems before they cause any unwanted problems.
